title: Lunar Revel merch available on diff days?
body:
https://oce.merch.riotgames.com/en/#

So the Firecracker Jinx figure is available form now until the 8th, that's great, thing is I want to buy it with the shirt so I don't pay two lots of postage, but he shirt isn't available until the 8th. I don't want to wait to get the figure because if their history is anything to go buy it's going to sell out in a couple days.

I got that the Teemo plush is going to be permanent so they introduced it early, but why are they separating the limited edition stuff to force people who want a guarantee of getting the figure to pay two lots of postage?

replies.body: To clarify, not a hate post, I'm just curious, and it would also be nice to know if there are plans to restock the figure if it does sell out before the 8th.
